original_text: Tell my father about the authority that I have here in Egypt. Tell him about everything that you have seen here. Then bring my father here quickly.’
korean_text: 당신들은 내가 애굽에서 누리는 영화와 당신들이 본 모든 것을 다 내 아버지께 아뢰고 속히 모시고 내려오소서 하며

sentences.original_text: Tell my father about the authority
that I have here in Egypt
Then bring my father here quickly
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 내 아버지를 여기로 빨리 데려오시오
